name: magnetically
content:
magnetically adverb
(PHYSICS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that uses magnetism (= the power of being able to attract iron and steel objects): Steel can be extracted magnetically from waste, but only 10% of local authorities have the necessary equipment. Data in computer hard drives is magnetically stored.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is a small plastic card that has a magnetically encoded strip on the back.The speakers are magnetically shielded so they won't damage your TV.They claim that magnetically treated water is relaxing to the body.
magnetically adverb
(ATTRACTED)
in a way that strongly attracts another person or people: The play is attractively staged and magnetically performed.magnetically drawn He seemed to be magnetically drawn to her all evening.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are magnetically attracted to successful sports players because of their vitality and confidence.Children seem magnetically drawn to his warmth and laughter. Your magnetically attractive qualities will certainly be apparent!
